reference_summary:
Gel Nail Polish Acrylic Steamer Remover Portable Harmless Nail Machine Nail Art Tools BLUETOP (Electric,White) BLUETOP {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.7 x 7.5 x 7.1 inches; 1.6 Pounds'} Works on acrylic nails without pealing off the top layer of nail or hurting my hands. I have only used once because I only remove my nails once a month or longer if I can, but it was much. Better than soaking or using foil or gloves. Both hands took me about 3 hours so I purchased a 2nd one so I could do each hand at the same time and I think I got the hang of getting the Acrylic off better towards the end so I hope to cut the time down to less than a hour next time.

It also came quickly Better than soaking Sofi Art Instant Soft Gel Nail Tips - Sculpted Almond Medium - 504 pcs 11 sizes SOFI-ART {'Size': '1 Count (Pack of 1)', 'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'SOFI-ART', 'Style': 'French', 'Coverage': 'Full Well Tips', 'UPC': '689354978250'} I have used on myself and mom. They are not that sculpted but nice. Thinner than the gelx but still nice. Nice nails. Sofi Art Instant Soft Gel Nail Tips - Stiletto Natural Medium - 504 pcs 10 sizes SOFI-ART {'Size': 'Medium', 'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'SOFI-ART', 'Style': 'Stiletto', 'Coverage': 'Full Well Tips', 'UPC': '689354978281'} Not my favorites but they are nice gel full cover tips. Nice Yokilly 120pcs French Nail Long Press on False Acrylic Nails Ballerina Glossy Full Cover Fake Nail Tips with Nail Stickers,Files and Stick (D) Yokilly {'Size': '120 Count (Pack of 1)', 'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'Yokilly', 'Style': 'French', 'Coverage': 'Full Well Tips', 'Package Dimensions': '7.8 x 2.56 x 0.71 inches; 0.71 Ounces', 'UPC': '190431067793'} Very pretty and nice Nice 3D Mix CHANGAR {'Brand': 'CHANGAR', 'Cartoon Character': 'Bubble', 'Reusability': 'Single Use', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '4.8 x 4.1 x 0.85 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '030391583141'} I thought it would be like foils but it is not. You really need to know how to encapsulate in acrylic You have to be able to use acrylic to make work Nail Art Foil Transfer Stickers Buffalo Plaid Design Classic Christmas Nail Foil Adhesive Decals, Christmas Decals Foil Stickers Set Nail Tips Manicure Women and Girls Nail Art DIY (Buffalo Plaid) BiBiSi {'Surface Recommendation Plastic': '', '': 'Unit Count 10.00 Count', 'Installation Type Self-Adhesive': '', 'Brand': 'BiBiSi', 'Color': 'Colorful', 'Theme': 'Christmas', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Kid', 'Reusability': 'Single Use', 'Pattern': 'Plaid', 'Package Dimensions': '5.25 x 4 x 1.25 inches; 3.21 Ounces'} Love it Love it
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Preferences:**
  - **Nail Care:** Strong interest in efficient tools for acrylic nails and gel products, now expanding to include decorative elements like nail art stickers.
  - **Technique:** Favors innovative methods that enhance efficiency, demonstrating a willingness to incorporate creative designs into monthly manicures.
  - **Frequency:** Uses products rarely but values quality and effectiveness, particularly now with added interest in seasonal and thematic designs.

- **Product Experience:**
  - **Multiple Use:** Invests in tools and decorative items to improve efficiency and explore new techniques, showing satisfaction with recent acquisitions.
  - **Learning Curve:** Despite commitment to mastering new techniques, recent purchases indicate ongoing challenges in effective product use, particularly with advanced skills.
  - **Positive Evaluation:** Maintains high ratings for several products, recently enhanced by enjoyment of decorative items, contributing positively to overall satisfaction.

- **Rating Behavior:**
  - **Balanced Evaluation:** Continues to provide honest feedback, with an average rating of 3.1 impacted by some recent disappointments but bolstered by positive experiences with new decorative stickers.

- **Delivery Expectations:**
  - **Timeliness:** Values prompt delivery and responsive customer service, aligning with the intent to use products in a timely manner for special occasions.

**Trends:**
- **Innovation Seeking:** Actively pursues modern, efficient solutions while embracing creative elements in nail care.
- **Hands-On Experience:** Engages deeply with products, reflecting a mix of creativity and practical challenges in mastering techniques.
